title: Gluten Free Lemon Blueberry Breakfast Bar
directions: Mash the banana in with the liquid ingredients
Mix all of the dry ingredients together
Slowly mix in the wet ingredients with the dry
Add in the blueberries, nuts/seeds, chocolate chips and lemon zest.
Place in a pan that is lined with parchment paper greased with coconut oil
Bake for 25 minutes or until lightly crispy on top
Let bars fully cool before cutting
ingredients: 2 cups gluten free oats (the quick rolling kind works best)
1 cup almond meal/flour (found in any health food store)
⅓ cup nuts/seeds (I used a mix of walnuts and pumpkin seeds)
Optional (and delicious): 1 cup semi-sweet, dairy free chocolate chips
